text: Oo hadday kugu cuslaatay jeedsigoodu, haddaba haddaad dalbi karto dalool aad hoos ugu baxdo arlada gudaheeda, ama sallaan (aad ku fuusho) samada si aad ugu keento calaamo (haddaba sidaa yeel). Oo hadduu Allaah dooni lahaa wuxuu hubaal isugu soo kulmin lahaa iyagoo dhan hanuunka, ee ha ka mid noqon jaahiliinta
